-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Support for writev, pwrite and pread.
--   
--   Support for writev, pwrite and pread using Ptrs and unix Fds. Fds can
--   be obtained using System.Posix.IO from the unix package and using
--   <i>handleToFd</i> or <i>openFd</i>.
@package unix-io-extra
@version 0.1

module System.Posix.IO.Extra
writev :: Fd -> [(Ptr a, Int)] -> IO ByteCount
pwrite :: Fd -> Ptr a -> Int -> COff -> IO ByteCount
pread :: Fd -> Ptr a -> Int -> COff -> IO ByteCount
